beer.beer_description: This is On The Inside, and by heavens, we are all here for this brand-new, topped-up-to-the-brim cream smoothie sour made in collaboration with our bestest pen-pals at Ophiussa Brewing Co from sunny Portugal ?? Combining post-fermentation additions of mango, banana, and vanilla ice cream all topped off with a big ol’ drizzle of Golden Syrup This obtusely packed fun tube is just the kind of insider madness one needs when face to face with summer’s drop-off. Um brinde a todos os novos amigos!

items.badge_description: Happy Sour Beer Day! September 20th marks the refreshing beginning of Sour Beer Day 2025, ripe for celebration! No need to sugarcoat it, these tart treats aren’t for everyone, but that’s just fine with sour lovers like us. Let us berry the hatchet and squeeze the day! Follow @untappd and drop a comment with your favorite sour!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 170 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 35!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 205 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 42.
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 170 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 35!

Marshmallow, chocolate, apple pie! Cakes and cookies catch my eye. Churn that butter, twist and shout. Put it in a pastry stout! That’s 95 different beers with the style of Stout - Pastry, Stout - Imperial / Double Pastry, or Sour - Smoothie / Pastry. Check-in to 5 more to get to Level 20.

Does the word picking favorites mean anything to you? Obviously not. That's 10 different beers in a row.

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 5 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description:
Hoppy International Beer Day!

Beer serves as the common thread that links us worldwide, possessing the ability to bring people together in a unique way.

Beer has played a significant role in shaping countless of our most cherished memories. And if there’s one thing we’ve learned along the way, beer is best when shared with others.

Celebrate one of the fastest growing sports in the world with this exclusive National Disc Golf Day badge sponsored by the Disc Golf Pro Tour. Disc golf is easy to learn, affordable to play, and accessible to all ages and skill levels. Played much like traditional golf but with flying discs and chain baskets, the game blends precision, strategy, and athleticism with serene natural environments. The best disc golfers in the world play on the Disc Golf Pro Tour. You can watch the Disc Golf Pro Tour for FREE on the JomezPro YouTube channel! WATCH DISC GOLF HIGHLIGHTS
